sqlMap.select:
SELECT TOP $topCnt$ a.vsl_cd, a.vsl_nm, a.cnt_cd, a.lnr_trdp_cd, b.shrt_nm, b.eng_nm AS lnr_trdp_nm FROM tb_vsl a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp b ON a.lnr_trdp_cd = b.trdp_cd AND b.delt_flg = 'N' WHERE a.use_flg = 'Y'
a.vsl_nm like #s_vessel_name#
a.vsl_cd like #s_vessel_code#
ORDER BY a.vsl_cd

SELECT count(a.vsl_cd) FROM tb_vsl a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp b ON a.lnr_trdp_cd = b.trdp_cd AND b.delt_flg = 'N' WHERE a.use_flg = 'Y'
a.vsl_nm like #s_vessel_name#
a.vsl_cd like #s_vessel_code#

SELECT TOP $topCnt$ vsl.vsl_cd, vsl.vsl_nm, vsl.cnt_cd, vsl.lnr_trdp_cd, tdp.eng_nm AS lnr_trdp_nm, vsl.rgst_usrid, vsl.rgst_ofc_cd, vsl.rgst_tms, vsl.modi_usrid, vsl.modi_ofc_cd, vsl.modi_tms, (CASE vsl.delt_flg WHEN 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN 'N' THEN 0 ELSE 0 END) AS delt_flg, vsl.use_flg, descr, 'Y' AS db_value FROM tb_vsl vsl LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp tdp ON vsl.lnr_trdp_cd = tdp.trdp_cd AND tdp.delt_flg = 'N' WHERE 1=1
vsl.vsl_cd like '%$s_vsl_cd$%'
vsl.vsl_nm like '%$s_vsl_nm$%'
vsl.lnr_trdp_cd like '%$s_lnr_trdp_cd$%'
tdp.eng_nm like '%$s_lnr_trdp_nm$%'
ORDER BY vsl.vsl_cd ASC

SELECT count(*) FROM tb_vsl vsl LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_trdp tdp ON vsl.lnr_trdp_cd = tdp.trdp_cd AND tdp.delt_flg = 'N' WHERE 1=1
vsl.vsl_cd like '%$s_vsl_cd$%'
vsl.vsl_nm like '%$s_vsl_nm$%'
vsl.lnr_trdp_cd like '%$s_lnr_trdp_cd$%'
tdp.eng_nm like '%$s_lnr_trdp_nm$%'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE tb_vsl SET vsl_nm = #vsl_nm#, cnt_cd = #cnt_cd#, lnr_trdp_cd= #lnr_trdp_cd#, descr = #descr#, modi_usrid = #modi_usrid#, modi_ofc_cd = #modi_ofc_cd#, modi_tms = GETUTCDATE(), delt_flg = #delt_flg#, use_flg = #use_flg# WHERE vsl_cd = #vsl_cd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tb_vsl ( vsl_cd, vsl_nm, cnt_cd, lnr_trdp_cd, descr, rgst_usrid, rgst_ofc_cd, rgst_tms, modi_usrid, modi_ofc_cd, modi_tms, delt_flg, use_flg ) VALUES ( #vsl_cd#, #vsl_nm#, #cnt_cd#, #lnr_trdp_cd#, #descr#, #rgst_usrid#, #rgst_ofc_cd#, getdate(), #modi_usrid#, #modi_ofc_cd#, GETUTCDATE(), #delt_flg#, #use_flg# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT vsl_cd FROM tb_vsl WHERE vsl_cd = #s_vsl_cd#
